attributes.action: Tell the truth, stop acting as though you are better than us poor unwashed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to the Iraq enquiry

To Quote Twain
"Lies, damned lies, and statistics"

Is it not ridiculous that Brown visits Afghanistan yesterday, in a nice new body armor. Whilst denying that when this ridiculous debacle started, the service me and women got none and bought there own boots.

I am amazed that any one in the recent visit actually wanted to shake your hand.

If you want the confidence of the public, stop evading questions, lying, misleading and being evasive.

Admit that you were not elected, get rid of Meedelson.

Very soon it might get through that most people loath you, do not believe a word you say, have never heard you give a straight answer to a simple question.

You are todays Baron Munchausen.

Why can't you see how hated you are ??
Or are you like Cowell, Lleweln-Bowen, Michael Winner or Gordon Ramsey... So far up yourself that you can only look down on others.

rejection.details: THis petition has makes point on government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
